feed.title: Shishir N. Y. Kolathaya
feed.subtitle: Use only the letters in perentheses and no space for email.

entry.title: Burger flipping paper in IROS 2018!
entry.content: Our recent work on flipping of burgers with Miso Robotics by using direct collocation based trajectory optimization is accepted for presentation at IROS 2018!
entry.summary: Our recent work on flipping of burgers with Miso Robotics by using direct collocation based trajectory optimization is accepted for presentation at IROS 2018!

entry.title: ISS-CBF paper in CDC 2018!
entry.content: My recent work on Input-to-state Safe Control Barrier Functions is accepted for presentation in ACC 2018!!.
entry.summary: My recent work on Input-to-state Safe Control Barrier Functions is accepted for presentation in ACC 2018!!.

entry.title: ISS-CLF paper in ACC 2018!
entry.content: My recent work on Input-to-state stabilizing control Lyapunov functions for realizing robust walking behaviors is accepted for presentation in ACC 2018!!. See video LINK.
entry.summary: My recent work on Input-to-state stabilizing control Lyapunov functions for realizing robust walking behaviors is accepted for presentation in ACC 2018!!. See video LINK.

entry.title: My new website!
entry.content: Just updated my new website. Powered by Jekyll!!
entry.summary: Just updated my new website. Powered by Jekyll!!

entry.title: Running paper is out!
entry.content:
The paper on DURUS-2D running which uses phase-to-state stabilizing controllers is out! Check out the paper for more details: Running Paper

A video of ‘DURUS-2D’ running:
entry.summary: The paper on DURUS-2D running which uses phase-to-state stabilizing controllers is out! Check out the paper for more details: Running Paper A video of ‘DURUS-2D’ running: https://youtu.be/3XQOO6kvHFY
